intro: Climb, throw and survive in a chaotic party game for 2 to 4 players!
description:
A chaotic local platform fighter where even the worst player can win.

In a world turned into a massive junkyard after humans disappeared, vermin have taken over. Rats, seagulls and other pests clash in an absurd monarchy for one thing only: to sit on the throne!

Royal Vermin is a 2 to 4 player local fighting game inspired by the best platform fighters, featuring ranged combat, chargeable projectiles and constantly unbalanced arenas. Every match is fast, unpredictable and always different.

KEY FEATURES
2 TO 4 PLAYER LOCAL GAME
Perfect for game nights with friends and same-screen play.

SIMPLE AND ACCESSIBLE CONTROLS
Easy to pick up, even for new players.

UNIQUE RANGED COMBAT
Grab projectiles, charge your shots and knock your opponents out of the level.

EVOLVING ARENAS
Levels collapse during combat and become increasingly dangerous.

REVENGE MODE
Even when eliminated, you can influence the match and cause spectacular comebacks.

HIGH REPLAYABILITY
Dynamic levels and special stages that break up the pace with varied objectives.

Free to play, Royal Vermin is designed to keep every match tight until the end and make you want to play just one more round.
